Entries.default: "Have you seen Ernezzo? I have a matter in need of his... expertise."
"No. Come now, what are you saying?"
"Really? You have not heard? Ernezzo is missing, di verus. And they say you-know-who was involved."
"I-I, well, I didn't... I mean, how was I to know...?"
"Shh! Can you not feel eyes on the back of you neck? Speak no more on it. For your sake and mine."
"Someone axed the Spindleman and his guards. Made a bloody mess of it, too."
"Clean or vile, dead is dead. Besides, I'm glad for it. Damn Vithrak gave me the creeps."
"Don't wave it around for anyone to see."
"Barely. I suppose. Let me get a better look at it."
"Well, hurry on then. You want it or not? Fifteen-hundred, and you won't find such finely-carved jade elsewhere. I can swear it."
"And how much for my friend, here?"
She eases her cloak to the side to showcase the dagger's hilt.
"Mhmm. And which Mataru prig did you steal it from?"
